============
Contributing
============

Contributions to `pybticino` are welcome!

Reporting Issues
----------------

If you encounter a bug, have a feature request, or find issues with the documentation, please open an issue on the `GitHub repository <https://github.com/TheKomputerKing/bticinoreverse/issues>`_ (replace URL if different).

Submitting Pull Requests
------------------------

1.  Fork the repository.
2.  Create a new branch for your feature or bug fix.
3.  Make your changes.
4.  Add tests for your changes if applicable.
5.  Ensure your code follows the project's style guidelines (e.g., run linters/formatters if configured).
6.  Update the documentation if necessary.
7.  Push your changes to your fork and submit a pull request to the main repository.

Code of Conduct
---------------

Please note that this project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By participating in this project you agree to abide by its terms.
